title: Black Screen everytime I try to go full screen
body: So this problem started last week, everytime I try to go full screen in game I get a black screen but borderless and windowed works fine. But boredered and windowless are extremely laggy. Is there any way to go to full screen in game without my game black screening. PLease help

replies.body:
I had this problem too, i managed to fix it. I open the file location of league of legends "file:///C:/Riot%20Games/League%20of%20Legends/", then i went to the search bar located somewhere near the top right corner (This should show all the league of legends applications). open properties of league then go to compatibility, when you find "disable fullscreen optimizations" make sure it is not selected. I did this to all the league of legends appilcations

Hope this helps
If you didn't understand i will make a Youtube video of it.

Heya,

You mentioned this started last week but the symptoms of your issue are similar to what players are experiencing with the recent update, they could be related but they may not be.
